explains: n. 沉思，冥想（等于 meditation）；诉说想法
adj. 冥想的，沉思的（等于 meditative）
v. 沉思，冥想；沉思地自言自语（muse 的现在分词）

sentences.en: I sat quietly, musing on the events of the day.
sentences.cn: 我静静地坐着，沉思一天中所发生的事。

sentences.en: She put the jacket away, and stood by musing a minute.
sentences.cn: 她把夹克收起来，站在那里沉思了一会儿。

sentences.en: Toad walked slowly round the car, inspecting, criticising, musing deeply.
sentences.cn: 托德绕着车慢慢地走着，审视、批评、沉思。
